name: Edgewood Services
tag_list: embedded-systems, hardware, software, ios-applications, mobile-development, iphone, ipad, recruiting, legal-services, outsourcing, offshore, ukraine, c, assembler, objective-c, windows, arm, microprocessors, microcontrollers, atmel, ms-sql, tcp-ip, modbus
overview:
Edgewood Services is an outsourcing company focused on delivering IT, recruiting and legal services of long term-value. Founded in 2008, our offices are located in Dnipropetrovsk and Kyiv (Ukraine). Services: • Embedded systems development, analog and digital hardware design, firmware design for microcontrollers, software development • iOS application development - iPhone, iPad • Recruiting services and building remote office of your company in Ukraine. • International legal services

Platforms – Microsoft Windows, Linux, Mac OS, iPhone Embedded Platforms – Microchip, Atmel, ST Microelectronics/ARM Programming languages – C, C++, Assembler, Objective C, QT Framework. GUI design. Databases – MS SQL, MySQl, PSQL, Firebird Network protocols - TCP/IP, Modbus, RS-485, ZigBee
